snippet.title: Making of NotEel, a Gamejam game [Devlog]
snippet.description:
In just one week time, Ghost13, Shoni and I made a game called NotEel! for the Brackeys Gamejam 2022/1, fitting to the theme of "it's not real"

This is an animated Devlog of the whole story, told through my perspective. 
You can play NotEel for free in your browser here: 
https://joonytv.itch.io/not-eel

We actually scored 28th place in the jam; with lots of wonderful comments about the art assets, scoring us 10th place in the art category out of 1645 entries. Id like to thank everyone who took their time to play the game; I'm really happy to provide an enjoyable experience and wanna develop games more often. Please feel free to leave a comment about how you think this kind of Devlog format could be improved

All music used in this video has been provided by Shoni; https://shonipal.carrd.co/

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Programs used to animate (both game assets and video):
ClipStudioPaint (art) 
Moho (animation) 
Premiere (I still got access to my free school licence lol)

If you wanna watch me work, i often stream on twitch:
https://www.twitch.tv/j_o_o_n_y

If im not currently live, im probably on my discord,
Pretty cool place btw, you should join the comunity: 
http://discord.gg/yhZ8K7m
